General.Name: Jetwell Computer Co Ltd
General.Description: Jetwell Computer Co., Ltd. provides IT infrastructure and integration services in Taiwan. It offers computer system products, including servers, workstations, notebooks, pads, and printer systems; and storage and big data integration services, as well as designs, builds, integrates, and sells thin client systems. The company also provides network products, such as firewall and intrusion detection systems, building green IDC, switch hubs, routers, network interface cards, and wireless network products, as well as international system management and planning and digital surveillance systems. In addition, it offers security software, file and database audit software, anti-virus, anti-hacker, SPAM, VM ware, and back-up software; building private cloud; and BYOD solutions. Further, the company integrates and sells encrypting file system and file management software. Additionally, it offers various professional services comprising maintenance contract, on-site maintenance, IT consultation, project management, and cloud rental and security services. Jetwell Computer Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
